testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the course with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request is sent to the /api/updateCourse/{id} endpoint with valid authorization
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateCourse/2388" path parameters.................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request to send to the API updateCourse endpoint containing the information 100, 15, 50 and "Web Development 101"..passed * The api user sends a PATCH request and saves the response returned from the API updateCourse endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user confirms that the remark information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the Message information in the response body is "Successfully Updated.".passed
